oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Authenticity and Fraud Information to Retailers regarding Control of Quality and Safety in Organic Production Chains

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This leaflet provides a practical overview for retailers of what is done to secure the authenticity and integrity of organically produced foods, where improvements are possible and what the retailers can do to support efforts that meet their customers’ demands. Other leaflets for retailers cover taste, freshness and nutrients or safety and contamination, and separate leaflets aim at consumers or at production of specific commodities.
